description:
This is a command line tool that generates (pretty much) the same unicorn avatar images as the Unicornify web service, just in better quality.

Unicorns are always generated based on a single (hexadecimal) number. Usually, this number is generated from an email address (by taking the MD5 hash, just like Gravatar). For example, the number corresponding to the address mail@example.com is 7daf6c79d4802916d83f6266e24850af.
summary: This is a command line tool that generates (pretty much) the same unicorn avatar images as the Unicornify web service, just in better quality.
author: Benjamin Dumke-von der Ehe
